DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study measure efficacy solifenacin succinate ( VESIcare ) treat urinary incontinence Parkinson 's disease patient . The secondary objective study examine effect solifenacin succinate ( VESIcare ) symptoms PD patient 's quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Solifenacin Succinate ( VESIcare ) Treatment Urinary Incontinence Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.criteria: 1 . Outpatients idiopathic PD accord UK Parkinson 's Disease Society Brain Bank Clinical Diagnosis Criteria . 2 . Age 30 year 80 year . 3 . Stable dose antiparkinsonian medication 4 week prior study entry . 4 . Patients must score 18 high UPDRS scale 1.0 2.5 Modified Hoehn Yahr scale . 5 . Women childbearing potential must use reliable method contraception . 6 . Must experience symptom urinary incontinence ( void 8 times/day episode incontinence 5 time per week ) . 7 . Patients must evidence normal PSA urodynamic test within last 12 month . 8 . Clearance patient 's urologist internist examine patient within last 12months . 1 . Any illness investigator 's opinion preclude participation study . 2 . Pregnancy lactation . 3 . Concurrent participation another clinical study . 4 . Dementia psychiatric illness prevents patient give informed consent ( Mini Mental Status Exam score less 24 ) . 5 . Legal incapacity limit legal capacity . 6 . Presence severe renal disease ( BUN 50 % great normal ) . 7 . Presence major hepatic impairment . 8 . Currently take ketaconazole ( antifungal ) CYP3A4 inhibitor . 9 . Any history bladder outflow obstruction gastrointestinal obstructive disorder . 10 . History control narrow angle glaucoma .
